price: Odoo inni warra Rabbiin qulqulleessan [1] irraa ta’uu baatee;
footnotes: [1] yeroo qurxummiin isa liqimsite " laa ilaaha illaa anta subhaanaka innii kuntu mina zzaalimiin " jedhee Rabbi kadhate.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
